0.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Kog'Maw enters a  zombie state for 4 seconds, gaining up to  40% bonus movement speed over the duration. At the end of the duration, he explodes to deal  125 − 550 (based on level) true damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Innate: Upon taking fatal damage, Kog'Maw enters a zombie state for 4 seconds, gaining up to  40% bonus movement speed over the duration. At the end of the duration, he explodes to deal  125 − 550 (based on level) true damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: fatal damage
zombie state
40% bonus movement speed
125 − 550 (based on level) true damage
125 − 550 (based on level) true damage

1.text: While under this state, Kog'Maw becomes  invulnerable,  untargetable, and  immune to crowd control, but is also rendered unable to declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, and activate items.
1.html: While under this state, Kog'Maw becomes invulnerable, untargetable, and immune to crowd control, but is also rendered unable to declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, and activate items.
markedPassages: invulnerable
untargetable
immune to crowd control

0.text: Passive: Kog'Maw gains  bonus attack speed.
0.html: Passive: Kog'Maw gains  bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

1.text: Active: Kog'Maw ejects a wad of spittle in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and reduces their  armor and  magic resistance for 4 seconds.
1.html: Active: Kog'Maw ejects a wad of spittle in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and reduces their  armor and  magic resistance for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: armor
magic resistance

0.text: Active: Kog'Maw empowers his basic attacks for the next 8 seconds to gain  bonus attack range and deal bonus magic damage  on-hit, capped at 100 against  minions and  monsters.
0.html: Active: Kog'Maw empowers his basic attacks for the next 8 seconds to gain  bonus attack range and deal bonus magic damage on-hit, capped at 100 against minions and monsters.

1.content: 3.5 / 4.25 / 5 / 5.75 / 6.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

markedPassages: bonus attack range
on-hit
minions
monsters
3.5 / 4.25 / 5 / 5.75 / 6.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
3.5 / 4.25 / 5 / 5.75 / 6.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

0.text: Active: Kog'Maw spews a gob of ooze in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Kog'Maw spews a gob of ooze in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: A field of ooze is created in its wake for 4 seconds,  slowing enemies every 0.25 seconds.
1.html: A field of ooze is created in its wake for 4 seconds, slowing enemies every 0.25 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

0.text: Active: Kog'Maw spits a globule of acid into the air that drops to the target location after 0.6 seconds, granting  sight of the area before dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  revealing them for 2 seconds. Living Artillery's damage is increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health), or instead by  100% if the target is below 40% maximum health.
0.html: Active: Kog'Maw spits a globule of acid into the air that drops to the target location after 0.6 seconds, granting sight of the area before dealing magic damage to enemies hit and revealing them for 2 seconds. Living Artillery's damage is increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health), or instead by 100% if the target is below 40% maximum health.
markedPassages: sight
revealing
0% − 50% (based on target's missing health)

1.text: Kog'Maw then gains a stack of Living Artillery for 8 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 9 times.
1.html: Kog'Maw then gains a stack of Living Artillery for 8 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 9 times.

2.text: Living Artillery: For each stack, Living Artillery's  mana cost is increased by 40.
2.html: Living Artillery: For each stack, Living Artillery's  mana cost is increased by 40.
markedPassages: mana cost

textContent.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Kog'Maw enters a  zombie state for 4 seconds, gaining up to  40% bonus movement speed over the duration. At the end of the duration, he explodes to deal  125 − 550 (based on level) true damage to nearby enemies.
textContent.html: Innate: Upon taking fatal damage, Kog'Maw enters a zombie state for 4 seconds, gaining up to  40% bonus movement speed over the duration. At the end of the duration, he explodes to deal  125 − 550 (based on level) true damage to nearby enemies.

textContent.text: While under this state, Kog'Maw becomes  invulnerable,  untargetable, and  immune to crowd control, but is also rendered unable to declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, and activate items.
textContent.html: While under this state, Kog'Maw becomes invulnerable, untargetable, and immune to crowd control, but is also rendered unable to declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, and activate items.
